about.name: Aaron
about.description: All works will be showcased here

abouttext.title: Aaron
abouttext.content: I am a passionate backend developer with a strong interest in information technology. During my internship at a startup, I gained hands-on experience with backend technologies (such as Node.js) and frontend frameworks (such as Vue.js). This journey allowed me to participate in multiple projects, collaborate with senior engineers, and enhance both my technical skills and problem-solving abilities.
